For-loop for nearest-neighbor classifier using Euclidean distanceÂ¶

for k=1:ntest
    delta=bsxfun(@minus, samples_train, samples_test(k,:));
    dst=sqrt(sum(delta.^2,2));
    if numel(dst)~=ntrain, error('wrng'); end
    [m, i]=min(dst);
    predicted(k)=targets_train(i);
end
